ValidationRule.description: If Start Date is empty you can't pass the status to "To be extracted".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), NOT($Permission.Sales_Admin), ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c, 'To be Extracted'), ISCHANGED(B2b_Status__c), ISBLANK(B2b_RouteStartDate__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Start Date is empty you can't pass the status to "To be extracted".
